name: Escape Room
description: Look for hints and disable the bomb. Now!! Your time is running short.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 480 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
